lexUnit.name: nightdress.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a light, loose garment worn by a woman or girl in bed.

sentence.text: ` I suppose I should have got hold of a nightdress for you .
Then he gently eased her arms down , and with infinite patience began to stroke her nightdress from her body .
Nannie sighed as she dropped the Viyella nightdress over Nicandra 's head .
There was one I craved in particular , a pink nightdress with a lace hem and a frilly neck and a family of rabbits embroidered on the chest .
Her nightdress was on the pillow of the double bed , her dressing gown behind the door and her handbag on top of the chest of drawers .
Her nightdress fell to the floor as she reached the door .
And everything about her , her long nightdress and the mist she was held in , was so golden-red that even the dark gold skin of her lovely face had a reddish tinge to it .
He 'd die when he saw her nightdress !
Even her thick nightdress seemed alarmingly minimal beneath his slow and deliberate contemplation .
Her pelvis jerked spasmodically , her cotton nightdress thrown high upon her chest .
Luce ate the dainty chicken sandwiches and salad , then put on her fine cotton nightdress and climbed into bed with a sigh .
He saw her back clothed in the flannelette nightdress .
It was n't as if he could see her in the flimsy satin nightdress , was it ?
She opened the case and looked with dismay at the flimsy green silk nightdress lying on top of the matching gown .
I tried not to think of her in the feathery nightdress under the influence of the aphrodisiac .
It was n't , she reminded herself sternly , as she tucked her rose-printed nylon nightdress beneath the quilt , as if this was a holiday .
Women in nightdresses peeping out of roadside houses lent a surreptitious air to the first few miles .
She had changed into a loose gauzy nightdress and released her hair so that it fell , witch-like , over her shoulders .
Just a flimsy nightdress and something on her feet .
Down from the top floor bounced the offspring of Mr and Mrs Beavis , the girls in nightdresses , the boys in nightshirts .
He burrowed in her drawers for a clean nightdress .
This realization led to several white calico garments ; fulsome petticoats , frilled blouses and fancy nightdresses being the most obvious , all of them generous with material .
Suddenly , the door bursts in , a small girl in candy-striped nightdress rushes in .
The nightdresses were worn by Queen Victoria in the eighteen seventies and eighties .
In her white nightdress she looked like a golden angel .
She leapt from the bed and grabbed at a newly-purchased cheap dressing gown , swiftly covering the white cotton nightdress .
She loved Karen , so demure in her neat white nightdress , she loved her dearly .
There was a flimsy nightdress which seemed to consist only of feathers and ribbons , and a mysterious stick of what looked like fudge .
On the side of the bed away from the window was Lily 's new silk nightdress , folded carefully by the chambermaid .
She was in her nightdress , bare legs and large slippers .

Maybe the women in Guido 's life were rather more accustomed to red silk nightdresses with plunging necklines and the sides split halfway up the thigh , but personally she had never possessed anything quite so racy .
A movement had startled me and I turned to see Robin-Anne Crowninshield , dressed only in a white nightdress , standing in the main companionway .
She sat down on her sleeping-bag , stripped off her sweater , her jeans , pulled on an old-fashioned nightdress in scarlet Viyella which had been her mother 's .

She pulled on a short silk nightdress -- a rather extravagant Christmas present from one of her sisters -- brushed her hair until the long dark strands gleamed , then walked slowly over to the window .
Beneath an open , high-necked , long-sleeved cotton dressing gown , she was wearing a simple white cotton nightdress , which stuck to her still damp body , and she smelt of soap and steam .
She wore a high-necked white nightdress .
His eyes dropped blatantly downward and she remembered with a start that she was wearing only a flimsy nightdress , barely skimming the tops of her slender thighs .
